full_summary:
################################################################################################################
**EC373-250161: Consultant Services for Wabush ATB and St. Anthony ATB Roofing Condition Assessment**

### Tender Information
| Attribute | Value |
|------------|--------|
| Solicitation Number | WS4657799135 |
| Publication Date | 2024-07-08 |
| Tender Closings Date | 2024-07-18T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Number | 0 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-08-19 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2026-03-31 |
| Tender Status | Expiring |

### Solicitation Details
This tender is a request for proposal (RFP) under the Supply Arrangement E0225-152290 – Architecture & Interior Design. The solicitation is issued by the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada.

Selected firms have been invited to submit proposals for consultant services for the condition assessment of the roofs of Wabush ATB and St. Anthony ATB. The condition assessment is required to identify and address any roofing issues to ensure the continued safe operation of the facilities.

Only firms with a marine discipline qualification for the province of Newfoundland and Labrador have been invited to participate. The selected firms are:

- DSRA Architecture Inc
- Lat49 Architecture Inc
- Coles Associates Ltd
- DFS Inc Architecture & Design
- Fougere Mencheton Architecture Inc
- Architecture49

### Proposal Submission
Proposals may be submitted in English or French. For further details on this solicitation, please refer to the related documents.

If a successful bidder is selected, a contract will be issued by PSPC on behalf of Transport Canada.

### Debriefing
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests should be made to the contracting authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

For any queries, please contact [Kate Mintzer](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) from the Atlantic Region Acquisitions branch.

### Important Dates
- Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-18T14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-08-19

###############################################################################################
Please note that all relevant details have been kept and necessary information was condensed for easy reading and understanding. The rewritten text maintains a consistent tone, proper capitalization, and selected pertinent details for clear readability
